Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: It inhibited the in vitro growth of X. axonopodis pv. glycines, the causative agent of the bacterial pustule disease, at 5 uM. Also active ex vivo and in vivo after vector transformation.

Literature.Title: Probing protein sequences as sources for encrypted antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Brand GD, Magalh?es MT, Tinoco ML, Arag?o FJ, Nicoli J, Kelly SM, Cooper A, Bloch C Jr.
